channel.title: Please Mopar help me, please
channel.description:
Alright, here's the situation: I'm having a little problem with my schedule because me and my girlfriend have diffrent lunch periods, and I didn't expect us to have some classes together besides lunch at least. Though since because of this, we're not going to be seeing each other at all, and this worries me a lot. I'm sending a big e-mail to the scheduling administration requesting that they can move me to another lunch period which being third. I'm acting like I'm one of the parents sending out the letter, and talking like I'm not Jimmy/James. At the moment I have this:
Hello SHS Scheduling Administration, This email is regarding my son, Jimmy Hernandez. I believe it would be in his best interest if we can somehow find a way to rework his schedule so that I would please ask of you to hear me out on this as I have come across a problem with the sent schedule. I have seen that during Jimmy’s work ethnic, it will obviously also require eating lunch at least as earliest as possible, though I would be pleased with regarding suggestions about this matter and appreciate all the help I could get. I’m truly worried about what his current lunch period being, and think that it should be a little earlier, at the latest of third lunch. I’ve talked it over with him and he told me that last year because of having fifth period lunch worked for a little while, he said that sometimes he would not even eat breakfast and want to eat around third and fourth period. Which I can conclude because of this, this has affected him in his academic classes. So I would please and will of course a e-mail back about this matter. Please contact me if you have any further options or questions regarding this email.
I'm hoping I can have them change their minds because the administration clearly stated that they would not change any lunch schedules but this girl is all I have, and I don't give a SHIT what people tell me just because I'm 15 and I don't know about Love, but because of this woman, she has shown me a lot and I can't stand not being with this girl, please Moparscape, please please help me with this one. For once in some of your trolling life times, or mean ass life times please ask normal, and a little mature and help me with this one, if I can get them to change their mind, I don't know what the Hell I'll do. So basically what I'm asking is what I typed up good enough, what changes do I need to make to persuade them anything, please help me!

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I’m just gonna lock this.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:8, topic:399584”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=496696.msg3634606#msg3634606 date=1308511761]
I’m heading into highschool freshman year this year. I have a girlfriend currently, almost our 1 year anniversary. I love her yeah, but i’m not IN love with her. We’re too young for love, if you can manage to stick with her the rest of your life, then you guys are in love. But we’re still young, especially me. I know i’m not in love yet and won’t be for a long time.

My uncle met his wife when he was 16, and he’s now 43 and they’re still married. That’s true love. I’m not saying you can’t be in love at a young age, but you have to know what love is.

I can’t see my girlfriend everyday, sometimes I can’t see her for weeks at a time, but we manage to work things out, make the best of it when i see her.

tldr; Make the best out when you see, forget what everybody else says, listen to your heart. Give her what she wants, spoil her, just make sure she has a great time whenever she’s with you.
[/quote]someone give this guy a cookie.[/quote]

i lik ohtmeal & rasin

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

This is getting ridiculous, everyone has their own sense of what love is. Mine is not to yell, hit and steal from my like my parents did, you can’t say someone doesn’t know what love is because pure love is what we experience when were at our youngest and at our oldest. I remember how much I loved my best friend when I was 6, I still love her to this day. Long story short love comes in many different forms and just because it isn’t the same as the love you know doesn’t mean its not real.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

When I went out on a date with her last night, I told her that she needed to move on if we didn’t have the same classes. She started almost tearing up and told me no, and kept repeating it, she refused and refused, we’ll see what happens if we don’t have the same classes.

Jesus Christ, this sounds like something out of a teenage drama show.

I think Vain is absolutely right, you need to man up and start taking some fucking responsibility, if you wanna see her that bloody bad talk to her fucking parents, you really do sound like a Drama queen, James.

Edit:
I’m dating a girl right now, I haven’t been able to see her for 3 weeks now. She’s still in the city, and stuff, but she’s busy. I’m not being a queen about it because I know I’ll be able to see her soon. Just wait till school finishes.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

I’m heading into highschool freshman year this year. I have a girlfriend currently, almost our 1 year anniversary. I love her yeah, but i’m not IN love with her. We’re too young for love, if you can manage to stick with her the rest of your life, then you guys are in love. But we’re still young, especially me. I know i’m not in love yet and won’t be for a long time.

My uncle met his wife when he was 16, and he’s now 43 and they’re still married. That’s true love. I’m not saying you can’t be in love at a young age, but you have to know what love is.

I can’t see my girlfriend everyday, sometimes I can’t see her for weeks at a time, but we manage to work things out, make the best of it when i see her.

tldr; Make the best out when you see, forget what everybody else says, listen to your heart. Give her what she wants, spoil her, just make sure she has a great time whenever she’s with you.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’m not some attention whore, I created this thread because I need some help. And I do love the woman, but I’m telling her to move on and this wasn’t the first because how much I hurt the girl, she will not leave me which I’m most thankful for, I know she loves me.

I never expected in the first place that I would be up her ass 24/7, all the emotions and feelings I have for this girl are true. So stop telling me I don’t know what love is, because I at least know the simple fact of it.

I never intended on becoming some kind of person who tells her girlfriend to move on if we don’t have some classes together, that’s not the point. The point is that after this year she may not even or ever see me again because I’m going to night school.

So get to learn the whole thing before jumping to a big conclusion.

@Others: Jesus Christ, I don’t intend on being with her the whole time, stop jumping to conclusions. I never wanted her to be smothered, ever SINGLE time I told her when she’s asked me to go out with her, I continue and continue to request that she hang out with her friends instead, she REFUSES EVERY SINGLE TIME. I’m not going to make her tear up and cry if I don’t come, that’s the stupidest move ever first off. Second off, she wants me to smother her basically, and if that’s what she wants, then I’m not going to stop her from wanting it.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Exactly what Vain said. Teenage dating is about exploration (lol), finding what you like in a girl and such.

As Vain said, you don’t need to constantly be there with her. Most girls like to spend time with their friends and do things on there own, I understand you love her a lot, but sometimes you just need to relax a little bit and let her breathe, no girl likes to be smothered.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I do partly agree with Vain. You shouldn’t of said she would need to move on, instead you should of reassured her. There is no point lingering over an email just read the thread make corrections then man up and send it.

If your time table isn’t changed then you need to accept that and find other ways.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

zoltanman:

All I’m going to tell you is not to shape your future around some girl. Telling her she needs to move on because of not having the same classes? Are you seeking attention from her telling her that bullshit? You’re in highschool, have fun man lol

Again, because this website doesn’t know a thing about my personal life they don’t know what the Hell I’m going through. I’m afraid telling me something like that isn’t going to work because it’s bullshit to me.

@Vain: Stop telling me stuff like you know everything about love whether it’s a little or nothing, as far as I’m concerned, love is diffrent for all and expressed and can be expressed in all sort of ways. Please do not tell me what I must and have to do with my life.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:53, topic:399565”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=496696.msg3633909#msg3633909 date=1308456964]

I’m sorry you fell that way, what I’m really trying to say is: There’s other fish in the sea, just don’t be heartbroken when and if you guys ever do split up.

This girl makes me happy, and the only person that truly makes me happy nowadays. I’ve never heard of such a crime for fighting for what I love.

Nevertheless, I’m about to send the e-mail out, we’ll see how things go.
[/quote]
Thats obsession. When she breaks/you guys break up, you’re going to be way to heartbroken.[/quote]
When I went out on a date with her last night, I told her that she needed to move on if we didn’t have the same classes. She started almost tearing up and told me no, and kept repeating it, she refused and refused, we’ll see what happens if we don’t have the same classes.

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:41, topic:399565”][quote author=`SJ_ link=topic=496696.msg3632688#msg3632688 date=1308355684]

In my opinion it sounds a little too formal and forced.

But if your mom knows, why not ask her to actually write the email?

Because my knowledge, grammar are is far more superior than her’s to be honest. And she told me that I should of seen this coming, but seeing as this girl is last of happiness and restricts me from doing things I don’t want to do, I don’t and not going to give it up that easily, I want to get better but how can I when this happiness will fade?

Listen mate, I’m not asking for like 500,000 dollars or a million something dollars, I’m asking for something that is life or death (at least to me).

Now please, just help me, I’m begging you, anyone for that matter, help me.

To me, it sounds like somebody is obsessed with a girl.
[/quote]
At this point Adam, I don’t see what it matters? To be honest, because no one knows about me that personal on this site, no one knows what I’m going through. Like you, it’s called obsession to me, it’s something completely diffrent.[/quote]

I’m sorry you feel that way, what I’m really trying to say is: There’s other fish in the sea, just don’t be heartbroken when and if you guys ever do split up.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Mopar help me, please
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Well all I can say is if you really love this girl you will find a way, I remember when I was in high school I use to get detention because we didn’t have a room just for it and they would put me in some random class room that always turned out to be my girlfriends class because the staff at the school liked me. Also don’t listen to anyone telling you that you don’t know what love is at your age, if anything the teenage years are when you know what love is the most because of all your hormones.

FINALLY!
Someone who knows what I’m going through here at little. Well, I’m doing what I can to make these cold bastards change the damn schedule, I still haven’t sent off the e-mail because I’m still make preparations to it, I told her I haven’t given up yet.

The fact of the matter is that if I can’t get them to change the schedule, death is going to become of them… Seriously though, I’m doing what I can.

Thanks Andrew.

medster:

If you really want to know, ask your parents what they would send in a situation like that.

Mother - I’m smarter than her in a lot of views and points, I don’t think I would even dare bother with her.
Step-Dad - He is pure Mexican, and doesn’t know that much because of how school is in Mexico.

Read full topic
